result.eng: He looked around with scare and panic.
result.ga: d'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeall
result.orig: d'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeall
result.html: d'amharc sé go scaollmhar scáfar ina thimpeallHe looked around with scare and panic.
result.ponchtml: d'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar scáfar ina ṫimpeallHe looked around with scare and panic.

result.ga: ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.orig: ní raibh eagla le cur orm
result.html: ní raibh eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ eagla le cur ormNothing could scare me.
